General.Name: Shandong Minhe Animal Husbandry Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Minhe Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the breeding, slaughtering, processing, and sale of commercial broiler chickens in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It also produces and sells bio-organic fertilizers; and generates biogas and photovoltaic power. The company offers its products to large and medium-sized breeding enterprises, farmers, and distributors. Shandong Minhe Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Yantai, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 2 and No. 3, Nanguan Road, Yantai, China, 265600
